(note: I might give this a go myself later today anyway, but otherwise anyone should feel free to self-assign sometime)

I briefly looked into this, a couple of things:

config should be at src/pages/blog.xml.js and be:
```
import rss from '@astrojs/rss'
import { getCollection } from 'astro:content'

export async function get(context) {
  const blog = await getCollection('blog')
  return rss({
    title: 'JUXT Blog',
    description:
      'JUXT is a UK based software firm and the creators of the bi-temporal graph database XTDB. This blog contains various posts written by our employees. The opinions expressed in the posts are those of the author, and not necessarily of JUXT.',
    site: context.site,
    items: blog.map((post) => ({
      title: post.data.title,
      pubDate: post.data.date,
      description: post.data.summary,
      link: `/blog/${post.slug}`
    })),

    trailingSlash: false,
    customData:
      '<author><name>JUXT Ltd</name><email>info@juxt.pro</email></author>'
  })
}
```

but this will only work when we move everything to be a [content collection](https://docs.astro.build/en/guides/content-collections/)
